ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 5 A Whole Lotta Characters Goin' On!
ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter 5 A Whole Lotta Characters Goin' On!: Red Hood and Task Force Z discover another group similar to their own led by Dr. Celia Shelley, but their meeting is interrupted by a third team led by KGBeast, who also claim to be working for the government to apprehend the other teams. With Task Force Z captured, KGBeast interrogates them for Amanda Waller, while Two-Face works on his own plan to save his team, and Mr. Bloom has plans to benefit himself.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 19:20:12. [CVDB908240] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:50:02. [Issue ID 2354596]
